com.google.appinventor.components.runtime
Class TextToSpeech

java.lang.Object
  com.google.appinventor.components.runtime.AndroidNonvisibleComponent
      com.google.appinventor.components.runtime.TextToSpeech
All Implemented Interfaces:
Component, OnResumeListener, OnStopListener
public class TextToSpeech
extends AndroidNonvisibleComponent
implements Component, OnStopListener, OnResumeListener

Component for converting text to speech using either the built-in TTS library or the TextToSpeech Extended library (which must be pre-installed for Android versions earlier than Donut).

Author:
markf@google.com (Mark Friedman)

Method Detail

Result

public boolean Result()
Result property getter method.

Language

public void Language(String language)
Sets the language for this TextToSpeech component.

Parameters:
language - is the ISO2 (i.e. 2 letter) or ISO3 (i.e. 3 letter) language code to set this TextToSpeech component to.

Language

public String Language()
Gets the language for this TextToSpeech component. This will be either an ISO2 (i.e. 2 letter) or ISO3 (i.e. 3 letter) code depending on which kind of code the property was set with.

Returns:
the language code for this TextToSpeech component.

Country

public void Country(String country)
Sets the country for this TextToSpeech component.

Parameters:
country - is the ISO2 (i.e. 2 letter) or ISO3 (i.e. 3 letter) country code to set this TextToSpeech component to.

Country

public String Country()
Gets the country for this TextToSpeech component. This will be either an ISO2 (i.e. 2 letter) or ISO3 (i.e. 3 letter) code depending on which kind of code the property was set with.

Returns:
country code for this TextToSpeech component.

Speaks the given message.

public void BeforeSpeaking()
Event to raise when Speak is invoked, before the message is spoken.

AfterSpeaking

public void AfterSpeaking(boolean result)
Event to raise after the message is spoken.

Parameters:
result - whether the message was successfully spoken
